replies.message: We're sorry you're disappointed Sara, sadly, we can't visit every city each year, so to give everyone a chance to see our truck we try to add new locations
Coca-Cola City? You've missed an entire county for the second year in a row - So much for a UK Tour - Once again giant corporation doesn't give a damn about the tiny little county in the SW of the UK
Coca-Cola really Glasgow again this year obviously you think Scotland is only Glasgow so sad when you just can't be bothered to actually tour the uk but just most in England
If you live close to Plymouth the truck will be parked on the Hoe for a few days if that helps? That's as close as it gets to me but I'm not far into Cornwall 😂
Get more trucks then. You got a huge franchise you can't afford to be disappointing paying customers

Coca-Cola  I moved to Cornwall from Manchester and used to love taking my kids to see the Coca Cola truck at the Trafford centre every year and the last 2 years they have been really disappointed that they missed it. I think it is a real shame that you can’t visit down here I am sure you would get a massive turnout.
Don't let the buggars come here to Cornwall and poison us with Aspartame
I am not disappointed as you can stay away with your poison Aspartame in Coca Cola
The children want to see the Christmas Truck Linda don't spoil it for them not all children drink Cola either
